body:
Dear Mostapha, Please see as below: the weather file I used for this two documents is same and both of the buildings are surrounded by all glazing facade. I felt quite confusing even the top floor has a quite low daylight autonomy for my building. [
](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dOkmBfdf6Mu6CjD*tItXi*5dP3iALI0n4XCAFtUrOBYkjBzB1uwfDUSC7sbLH8A6V7wMxBizbFjZNCmuoFkQH0lei4nwoFCQ/Resultfordaylightautonomy.jpg)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dOkmBfdf6MttG9pV88sjt7ad57CsZn0FaDstUrfTKHmg2IeGaPCTN6lU0EdgPN6O4GKMFewhzZB1pd9DpjTB3T5VgFq6ppR8/Resultfordaylightautonomy.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dOkmBfdf6MvUebe0s5EWXcb-n6J8ezrTzjX5cjVHGh6Y5DpmWl-yN9eVc4WM-iVoHj0nnKLUI3QmVdjv0FJvmxsgvAMpEWtA/Resultfordaylightautonomy2.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dOkmBfdf6MupOhnjvQuqoRLbWklfT6TGvLbTntfW98FT1*s9gsMAzBSbAWeUmxSRCw1uizn1xBoTUh60zGi1P9-K97iHbRnc/Resultfordaylightautonomy_Examplefile.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dOkmBfdf6MvTA3YsMOePuRKiWHrlrlLwdszB43FEpL0MEoSGt7MdklyNZ*bs9vjr4YGMtMIJ6tm7PQH6rhExc0gdVHpi6nxr/Resultfordaylightautonomy_Examplefile2.jpg)
